text:
The invention of televison was a massive advance in the 30's. It was the first time that we can had in our living room an image moving with sound. This invention was a big change in the world. We can saw much of things that before with only one little screen. The television become an influent way of communication very quickly. TV debates, daily news, sports and others programs become more popular thanks to television. In Paris TV in color arrived in the late 70's and it's basically at this moment that we saw the power of television.
 I think in nowadays television it's decreasing. The new generation is bored about seeing the same way of entertainment every day. The TV News are less viewed by the people thanks to the speed of internet. Even now if some of the content on TV can be in full hd or 4k, they are used to see platforms like YouTube, Netflix, Amazon Prime etc and no more to see TV News. I think that TV become more than just TV Channels and that is a very important problem for the industry of television entertainment. I think television still have an influence in people mind but new generations are getting older and on these generations TV is having less influence than social media or new streaming platforms.
